description: Milena Marius is a fourth-year student and Chevalier at East Genetics and Cassie`s best friend. She was one of the many Pandoras infected into Nova Form during the tenth Nova Clash at West Genetics until she was defeated by Chiffon. Her Volt Weapon is a drill lance. In the anime, she is an East Genetics instructor and Cassie`s teacher.
name: Milena Marius
